7// BufferImpl.cpp: Implementation methods rx::BufferImpl class.
8
9#include "libANGLE/renderer/BufferImpl.h"
10
11namespace rx
12{
13
14angle::Result BufferImpl::getSubData(const gl::Context *context,
15 GLintptr offset,
16 GLsizeiptr size,
17 void *outData)
18{
19 UNREACHABLE();
20 return angle::Result::Stop;
21}
22
23angle::Result BufferImpl::setDataWithUsageFlags(const gl::Context *context,
24 gl::BufferBinding target,
25 const void *data,
26 size_t size,
27 gl::BufferUsage usage,
28 GLbitfield flags)
29{
30 return setData(context, target, data, size, usage);
31}
32
33} // namespace rx
